course_description: This course aims to prepare pastors and Christian leaders to build relationships of trust and understanding with Muslims in their own communities. It approaches Islam as a lived religious tradition that is not merely present in the United States, but has become an American religion. It examines Islamic history, theological beliefs, and worship practices through the lens of Muslim American experiences and introduces students to the diverse manifestations of Islam in America and in Atlanta.
